deploy.description:
[36mCreate a new deploy from the contents of a folder[39m

Deploys from the build settings found in the netlify.toml file, or settings from the api.

functions.name: functions
functions.description: Specify a functions folder to deploy

init.description: [36mConfigure continuous deployment for a new or existing site[39m

manual.name: manual
manual.description: Manually configure a git remote for CI

force.name: force
force.description: Force init a site that is already configured to use CI

watch.name: watch
watch.description: Make the CLI wait for the first deploy to complete after setting up CI

link.description:
[36mLink a local folder to a site on Netlify[39m

Required for performing operations on sites like deploys.  For interactive linking, omit all flags.

id.name: id
id.description: ID of site to link to

name.name: name
name.description: Name of site to link to

force.name: force
force.description: Force link a folder to a site, even if the folder is already linked

login.description:
[36mLogin to your Netlify account[39m

Opens a web browser to acquire an OAuth token.

unlink.description: [36mUnlink a local folder from a Netlify site[39m
